comment:
Final standings: Spassky 7, Bronstein and
Stein 6 1/2, Kholmov 6, Suetin and Korchnoi 5 1/2, Geller 5. Spassky,
Bronstein and Stein have qualified for the interzonal tournament. Seven of the
twelve best players of the world played in a zonal tournament. It showed Boris
as a comeback kid.  Jan van Reek
